Name: UCSB
Description: A great university locates along the California coast!

Name: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Description: The first time I ever got on a plane, it was to Kuala Lumpur. I don't remember much but it was very beautiful and the food was great.

Name: London, UK
Description: I was around 8 years old when I first went to London. I became friends with some Irish girls and I remember we had a hard time understanding each other because we spoke English with different accents.

Name: Karachi, Pakistan
Description: My parents are from here and I have a lot of family that lives here, so I visit them every few years.

Name: Houston, Texas
Description: My cousins live here and visiting them is always fun. We love trying out new food together.

Name: Bakersfield
Description: I know everyone hates it but I grew up here and I have some very fond childhood memories of it.
